testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin), I should be able to access
testcase.name: GET body with valid authorization information and correct data (id) is sent to the /api/getNoticeById endpoint, it should be verified that the status code returned is 200 and the message information in the response body is “Success”.
testcase.system-out: * The api user sets "api/getNoticeById" path parameters.....................passed * The api user prepares a Get request containing the 341 information to send to the api getNoticeById endpoint..passed * The api user sends a GET body and saves the returned response.............passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the "message" information in the response body is "Success"..passed * The api user verifies the information in the response body includes "341","notice", "Ein","hallo""2023-06-02"..passed
